Search Results for

    Getting Started with Touki

    The sample project demonstrates how to configure your own projects to leverage the features provided by Touki.

    Project File Setup

    To use Touki effectively when targeting .NET Framework, you need to ensure your project file is set up correctly.

    See sample.csproj for a concrete example project for multi-targeting. The key points are:

    • Target both .NET Framework (4.7.2 or later) and .NET (10.0 or later) with <TargetFrameworks>.
    • Disable <ImplicitUsings> to allow redirecting System.IO to Microsoft.IO.

    In addition to this, manually configure usings in GlobalUsings.cs to seamlessly leverage "polyfill" extensions and manually add the "normal" implicit usings (outside of "System.IO").
